description: Manage a gen2 environment in the specified subscription and resource group.

commands.name: az tsi environment gen2 create
commands.summary: Create a gen2 environment in the specified subscription and resource group.
examples: az tsi environment gen2 create --name "env2" --location westus --resource-group "rg1"                --sku name="L1" capacity=1 --time-series-id-properties name=idName type=String                --storage-configuration account-name=your-account-name management-key=your-account-key

commands.name: az tsi environment gen2 update
commands.summary: Update a gen2 environment in the specified subscription and resource group.
examples: az tsi environment gen2 update --name "env2" --resource-group "rg1"                --warm-store-configuration data-retention=P30D                --storage-configuration account-name=your-account-name management-key=your-account-key
